text: Nba, a miriya tɛ an na fewu ka murunti Allabatala kanma ka bɔ a la sila kan. An ma saraka janin diya wo lɔ saraka janintailu janin kanma a kan, wala ka suman saraka wala sarakailu gbɛrɛilu bɔ a kan. An tɛ a fɛ ka saraka bɔ saraka janin diya si kan, fo an Maari Allabatala saraka janin diya, mɛn ye a la daa makɛ faaninbon donda la.»
